title: Sheepshifter

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Sheepshift 2 players at night, transporting them and turning them into sheep the following day. Poeple do not learn they were transported nor that they were turned into sheep.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Sheep's votes don't count, and they instead secretly vote whoever you vote. If you do not vote, the sheep's votes become normal again.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure the good faction loses (this can win while dead).

desc:
Post 4858
*"So **this** is how you transport people!"*
*"...you turned them into sheep."*
